question: During whose reign Fernao Nuniz visited Vijaynagar empire?
explanation: A Portuguese merchant , Fernao Nuniz (1534-1537 AD) visited Vijayanagar empire during the reign of Achyuta Raya (the Tuluva dynasty ruler). He wrote the history of the empire from its earliest times to the closing years of Achyuta Rayaâ€™s reign.
